attributes.action: Extend the NO SMOKING BAN to parts of Beer gardens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To extend the NO SMOKING LAW to incorperate parts of the beer garden.  Why should Non smokers sit in a beer Garden with loads of smokers, I propose that at least half of all beer gardens should be made Non Smoking.  Think of the Children sitting in Beer Gardens with all that smoke about.
